snippet: The presence of M.I.T. and Harvard, along with several hospitals, is attracting drug developers happy to draw on a large pool of scientists.
abstract: Presence of research giants like MIT and Harvard in Cambridge, Mass, along with several hospitals, is attracting drug developers happy to draw on a large pool of scientists.
lead_paragraph: The presence of M.I.T. and Harvard, along with several hospitals, is attracting drug developers happy to draw on a large pool of scientists.

headline.seo: Biotech Players Lead a Boom in Cambridge
headline.main: Biotech Players Lead a Boom in Cambridge
headline.print_headline: Biotech Players Lead a Boom in Cambridge
